body: I put up a discussion in off-topic and found that many other people had the same problem. If someone could look into fixing that, that would be awesome.
body_tagged: I put up a discussion in off-topic and found that many other people had the same problem. If someone could look into fixing that, that would be awesome.
title: Voting for XP isn't working

replies.body:
read the ingame massages :
"report bugs at github (https://github.com/Avicus/Issues/issues)"
And don't make multiply post in the forums. And this would be server feedback, if it's server feedback. This picture say all

replies.body: you really love your xp dont you

replies.body: Well, I saw a problem, and took it from off-topic (to gather info) to Avicus Help (to get something done). And yes, I do like my xp.
